description.value:
A great fiery eye opens, and as the eye winks, it erupts in a burst of flames.

Daily âœ¦ Arcane, Conjuration, Elemental, Fire, Teleportation

Minor Action • Ranged 10

Effect: You conjure a Large eye of Imix in an unoccupied space in range. The eye persists until the end of your next turn. Each creature other than you that starts its turn adjacent to the eye takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends). Any creature that enters the eye's space takes 10 fire damage and can then teleport up to 5 squares as a free action. Until the effect ends, you can use the secondary power.

Sustain Minor: The eye persists until the end of your next turn. Roll a d6. On a 1, you cannot use the secondary power on your next turn. On a 6, creatures within 3 squares of the eye take fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 104.
